name: natspec.js
description: Javascript Library used to evaluate natspec expressions

scripts.build: cd dist && browserify -r ../natspec.js:natspec -i crypto -o natspec.js && uglifyjs natspec.js --source-map natspec.js.map -c -m -o natspec.min.js
scripts.test-coveralls: istanbul cover _mocha -- -R spec && cat coverage/lcov.info | coveralls --verbose
